name: Ultimate Collab Night
description:
Helo there! This is a neat game i made on Scratch. Is a fangame of Ultimate Custom Night. Also, i'm new here. Hope you have fun with the game. Also, be patient. Game takes some time to load. Thank you :3.

Controls:

W - Turn on/off lights

A - Open/Close left door

D - Open/Close right door

S - Open/Close camera

R - Reset data

Challenges:

Dog Hater: Activate Juanma, Lola and Sparky

Weirdos: Activate Stilex, Clamp, Trainy, The Shadow, Stiles and Golden Damian

The Family Man: Activate Damian, Luca, Juanma, Mom and Lola

Nostalgia: Activate Damian, Clamp, Trainy and Golden Damian

Spot The Difference: Activate Damian, Lola, Stilex, Sparky, Stiles and Golden Damian

Ladies Night: Activate Mom, Lola and Clamp

The Annoying: Activate Damian, Clamp and Mom

V Eyebrow: Activate Stilex, Juanma, Trainy and The Shadow

4/20: With 4 random characters activated

8/20: With 8 random characters activated

12/20: All of them activated
